titles.title: To prohibit officers and employees of the Internal Revenue Service from using personal email accounts to conduct official business.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

bill.summary: 9/16/2014--Passed House without amendment. Prohibits any officer or employee of the Internal Revenue Service (IRS) from using a personal email account to conduct official business.
